advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara.description: 种植幻昙华。这种植物在月光下成长，在阳光下枯萎
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara.title: 月光作物
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara_flower.description: 获得幻昙花。幻昙华只在满月夜的月光下开花，开花10秒之后花将会凋谢
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara_flower.title: 昙花一现
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.koishi_hat.description: 和恋恋玩，获取帽子先生
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.koishi_hat.title: 钢盔
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.mary_call.description: 半妖怪化状态下在下界被恋恋打电话
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.mary_call.title: 这里是玛丽小姐～
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_hat.description: 收集信仰获取诹访子的帽子
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_hat.title: 信仰收集
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_wear.description: 在半妖怪化或者妖怪化状态下给青蛙带草帽
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_wear.title: 祟神之路
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.lost_memories.description: 露米娅受到40点以上的伤害时会变化为Ex露米娅。用弹幕击败Ex露米娅并获得露米娅的发带
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.lost_memories.title: 失落的记忆
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.spellcard_power.description: 你在村民面前吃人肉时灵梦会出现并试图治退你。击败灵梦并获得她的符卡
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.spellcard_power.title: 赤色杀人魔
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.trade_danmaku.description: 妖怪化状态下和露米娅交易获取弹幕
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.trade_danmaku.title: 可口的交易
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.alcoholic.description: 使用发酵桶酿酒并喝酒获得醉酒效果
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.alcoholic.title: 嗜酒如命
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.passed_out.description: 不断喝酒直到醉酒效果堆叠到最高级
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.passed_out.title: 烂醉如泥
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.feed_reimu.description: 投喂灵梦妖怪归家中所有正常的食物，灵梦会给你她的大蝴蝶结作为谢礼
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.feed_reimu.title: 满足的灵梦
